title: A Baby Sister for Frances
description: Frances has a new baby sister . . . and she's not happy about it. With the new addition to the family, no one pays much attention to Frances anymore. At least that's the way it seems to her. So Frances decides to run away. Not too far, thoughâ€”just far enough so she can hear how much she'll be missed, even by baby Gloria!
author: Russell Hoban
